content.text: Hey! I'm glad I found you. I have a question and I need your help.
I'm trying to plan a surprise birthday party for my husband. I'm not sure where to start.
Oh that's so exciting! Do you know what he likes?
That's so funny! I love that movie too.
I know, right? It's one of my favorites too.
Well, I think you should definitely have a Good Burger themed party. You could have a burger eating contest, or a costume contest where everyone dresses up as a character from the movie.
That's such a great idea! I love it!
I'm glad you like it! I think he would really appreciate it.
I know he will! Thank you so much for your help!
No problem! I'm happy to help.
Well, I'm going to go start planning the party.
Have fun! I can't wait to hear how it goes.
